snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin and other senior Russian officials also reiterated the Kremlin’s contention that Ukraine owes Russia more than $16 billion in unpaid gas bills and other debts.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin and other senior Russian officials also reiterated the Kremlin’s contention that Ukraine owes Russia more than $16 billion in unpaid gas bills and other debts.

headline.main: Putin Warns of Restricting Natural Gas Supply to Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Putin Warns of Restricting Natural Gas Supply to Ukraine
